statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.REG_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.REG_ID , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , AA.ADDRESS_TYPE , AA.REMARKS
, AA.ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
, AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UCD.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.ADDRESS AD ON AA.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID#
AND AA.REG_ID = #REG_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UCD.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS ( CUSTOMER_ID, ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_TYPE, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #CUSTOMER_ID#, #ADDRESS_ID#, #ADDRESS_TYPE#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS REG_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS SET ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID# , ADDRESS_TYPE= #ADDRESS_TYPE# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE REG_ID = #REG_ID#
